geneId.description:
The ID to which the wildtypeExpression ontology term(s) is applied. For this submission,
      these will be genes.

whereExpressedStatement.description: use to provide a human-readable text display for the combination of 1->many ontology terms coded in the whereExpressedTermIdentifiers collection.

taxonId.description: The taxonId for the species of the gene entity.

dataProvider.description: Constrains the dataProvider to conform to the dataProvider schema.  This schema enforces that a dataProvider provide the taxonId of the record being added, as well as the database source.  see dataProvider.json for more information.

startStage.description: the id that represents the start of the expression annotation

endStage.description: the id that represents the	end of the expression annotation

assay.description: the ECO (ontology) id that represents the assay type of the expression, ie: in-situ.

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.
